avionics: Avionics, IMU, barometer, algorithms, module versions
cameras: Ambient light, forward vision sensors, FPV camera, FPV gimbal motor
operation: Mission radius, restricted altitudes or zones
propulsion: ESCs, motors, vibrations, arms not securely fastened
RF: SDR radio communication between remote control and drone, GNSS, RTK
spraying: Load sensor, single-point Hall sensor, pumps, flow meter, centrifugal nozzles
